body:
Comment 3: 
The playground underlying the run button limit the amount of time each process
could take.

Also, as explained in the comment in the code:
// Concurrent computation of pi.
// See http://goo.gl/ZuTZM.
//
// This demonstrates Go's ability to handle
// large numbers of concurrent processes.
// It is an unreasonable way to calculate pi.
It's not a reasonable way to calculate pi.
